DOC.brief_summary: To demonstrate that import Mesalazine (ASACOLÂ®) is non-inferior to the reference drug, marketed Mesalazine, regarding the primary endpoint (rate of non-emergence of bloody stool), in patients with Ulcerative Colitis in remission, treated for 48 weeks.
DOC.brief_title: Comparative Efficacy and Safety Study in Patients With Ulcerative Colitis in Remission Phase
DOC.criteria: Patients with ulcerative colitis in remission who are defined to show an Ulcerative ColitisDisease Activity Index (UCDAI) score of 2 or less and a bloody stool score of 0. Patients who take adrenal corticosteroid (oral formulation, enemas, suppository, agents for hemorrhoidal disease, injectable solution) within 14 days before start of administration of clinical study drug.
